article_title: Bitter Obama on GOP: If I Said Apple Pie Is Great, They'd Say No
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

President Obama campaigned in Maryland on Sunday for Anthony Brown – the Democratic candidate for governor, but spent most of his speech bashing Republicans.

Speaking to audience members who hadn’t left yet, Obama explained that Republicans weren’t just against his policies, they were against him.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

He continued.

Obama continued, accusing Republicans running for office for not being interested in helping people.

He reminded supporters that Republicans were only running on cynicism, not hope.

Citing Republican policy ideas such as cutting taxes and repealing Obamacare, Obama continued.
